lead_paragraph: Update | 5:09 p.m. A federal grand jury formally indicted Raj Rajaratnam and Danielle Chiesi on Tuesday, accusing the billionaire founder of the Galleon Group and the former Bear Stearns hedge fund manager of operating at the center of a vast insider trading ring that profited from corporate secrets passed between an extensive network of informants.

headline.main: Grand Jury Indicts Galleon Chief and Associate
